# Importing the data

```{r echo=TRUE}
recent_grads <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/master/college-majors/recent-grads.csv")
```


```{r}
recent_grads |> 
    count(Major,
          sort = TRUE,
          wt = Total, # what column should be summed up to instead of summing the number of observtions
          name = "Graduates")

recent_grads |> 
    add_count(Major) |> 
    
```
